comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Carter Henry Harrison, Jr. (April 23, 1860, Chicago, Illinois - December 25, 1953), Mayor of Chicago (1897–1905 and 1911–1915). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carter_Harrison,_Jr. (link corrected, thanks to [http://www.flickr.com/photos/artolog])

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of February 15, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20A12FB3B5B1773... indicates that Congressman Sabath of Illinois suggested to President Woodrow Wilson that Harrison might be made Secretary of War.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks B-59 for giving us his full name and background. We will update our records.
